sentences: Vajasin põhjalikke andmeid tema tegevuse kohta.
context: The word 'põhjalik' is an Estonian adjective that means detailed, thorough, comprehensive, or in-depth. It describes something that goes deeply into the essence of something, is precise down to fine details, complete and all-encompassing. This adjective can be used to modify nouns in different cases - in the examples provided, it appears in the partitive plural form 'põhjalikke' when modifying plural objects like 'andmed' (data), 'arutlus' (discussion), and 'seletused' (explanations).
